languages.text: {n}Медленно, очень медленно воздух вокруг вас перестает звенеть от потусторонней стужи. В лице дознавателя появляется признак жизни: он устало опускает веки и с сипом втягивает воздух сквозь посиневшие губы, по его телу пробегает крупная дрожь.{/n} "{name}? Что... произошло?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Медленно, очень медленно воздух вокруг вас перестает звенеть от потусторонней стужи. В лице дознавателя появляется признак жизни: он устало опускает веки и с сипом втягивает воздух сквозь посиневшие губы, по его телу пробегает крупная дрожь.{/n} "{name}? Что..."

languages.text: {n}Slowly, very slowly, the otherworldly chill begins to retreat from the air around you. A flicker of life appears in Heinrix's face — his eyelids blink in exhaustion, he pulls a ragged breath in past his blue lips, and violent tremors wrack his body.{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"
languages.original_text: {n}Медленно, очень медленно воздух вокруг вас перестает звенеть от потусторонней стужи. В лице дознавателя появляется признак жизни: он устало опускает веки и с сипом втягивает воздух сквозь посиневшие губы, по его телу пробегает крупная дрожь.{/n} "{name}? Что... произошло?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Slowly, very slowly, the otherworldly chill begins to retreat from the air around you. A flicker of life appears in Heinrix's face — his eyelids blink in exhaustion, he pulls a ragged breath in past his blue lips, and violent tremors wrack his body.{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"

{n}Slowly, very slowly, the otherworldly chill begins to retreat from the air around you. A flicker of life appears in Heinrix's face — his eyelids blink in exhaustion, he pulls a ragged breath in past his blue lips, and violent tremors wrack his body.{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"

{n}Slowly, very slowly, the otherworldly chill begins to retreat from the air around you. A flicker of life appears in Heinrix's face — his eyelids blink in exhaustion, he pulls a ragged breath in past his blue lips, and violent tremors wrack his body.{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"

languages.text: {n}渐渐地，来自另一个世界的寒意慢慢地从你周围的空气中消退，海因里希的脸上也现出了一丝生机。他疲惫地眨着眼睛，乌青的嘴唇中缓缓吐出一口气，整个身体都在剧烈地颤抖着。{/n}“{name}？这是……怎么回事？”
languages.original_text: {n}Slowly, very slowly, the otherworldly chill begins to retreat from the air around you. A flicker of life appears in Heinrix's face — his eyelids blink in exhaustion, he pulls a ragged breath in past his blue lips, and violent tremors wrack his body.{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"

traits.locale_text: {n}渐渐地，来自另一个世界的寒意慢慢地从你周围的空气中消退，海因里希的脸上也现出了一丝生机。他疲惫地眨着眼睛，乌青的嘴唇中缓缓吐出一口气，整个身体都在剧烈地颤抖着。{/n}“{name}？这是……怎么回事？”

languages.text: {n}Lentamente, muy lentamente, el frío sobrenatural empieza a dejar el aire que os rodea. Un destello de vida aparece en el rostro de Heinrix. Parpadea, cansado, respira con dificultad a través de sus labios azulados y su cuerpo se estremece y tiembla.{/n} «¿{name}? ¿Qué... qué ha pasado?».
languages.original_text: {n}Slowly, very slowly, the otherworldly chill begins to retreat from the air around you. A flicker of life appears in Heinrix's face — his eyelids blink in exhaustion, he pulls a ragged breath in past his blue lips, and violent tremors wrack his body.{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Lentamente, muy lentamente, el frío sobrenatural empieza a dejar el aire que os rodea. Un destello de vida aparece en el rostro de Heinrix. Parpadea, cansado, respira con dificultad a través de sus labios azulados y su cuerpo se estremece y tiembla.{/n} «¿{name}? ¿Qué... qué ha pasado?».

languages.text: {n}ゆっくりと、とてもゆっくりと、別世界のような寒気が周囲の空気から退き始める。ハインリックスの顔に生気がゆらめく。そのまぶたが疲れによって瞬き、青い唇から荒い息を吸い込み、体を激しく震わせる。{/n}「{name}？何が…起きたんだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}Slowly, very slowly, the otherworldly chill begins to retreat from the air around you. A flicker of life appears in Heinrix's face — his eyelids blink in exhaustion, he pulls a ragged breath in past his blue lips, and violent tremors wrack his body.{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ゆっくりと、とてもゆっくりと、別世界のような寒気が周囲の空気から退き始める。ハインリックスの顔に生気がゆらめく。そのまぶたが疲れによって瞬き、青い唇から荒い息を吸い込み、体を激しく震わせる。{/n}「{name}？何が…起きたんだ？」

languages.text: {n}Lentement, très lentement, le froid glacial s'amoindrit. Une étincelle de vie illumine le visage d'Heinrix. Le corps agité de tremblements, il cligne des yeux avant d'inspirer laborieusement une goulée d'air à travers ses lèvres bleuies.{/n} « {name} ? Que... s'est-il passé ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Slowly, very slowly, the otherworldly chill begins to retreat from the air around you. A flicker of life appears in Heinrix's face — his eyelids blink in exhaustion, he pulls a ragged breath in past his blue lips, and violent tremors wrack his body.{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Lentement, très lentement, le froid glacial s'amoindrit. Une étincelle de vie illumine le visage d'Heinrix. Le corps agité de tremblements, il cligne des yeux avant d'inspirer laborieusement une goulée d'air à travers ses lèvres bleuies.{/n} « {name} ? Que... s'est-il passé ? »

languages.text: {n}Sehr, sehr langsam verschwindet die außerweltliche Kälte aus der Luft um dich herum. In Heinrix' Gesicht lässt sich ein Lebensfunken erkennen – vor lauter Erschöpfung blinzeln seine Augenlider. Seine Lippen sind blau, er holt röchelnd Luft und sein Körper zittert heftig.{/n} "{name}? Was ... ist geschehen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Slowly, very slowly, the otherworldly chill begins to retreat from the air around you. A flicker of life appears in Heinrix's face — his eyelids blink in exhaustion, he pulls a ragged breath in past his blue lips, and violent tremors wrack his body.{/n} "{name}? What... happened?"

In Heinrix' Gesicht lässt sich ein Lebensfunken erkennen – vor lauter Erschöpfung blinzeln seine Augenlider. Seine Lippen sind blau, er holt röchelnd Luft und sein Körper zittert heftig.{/n} "{name}? Was ... ist geschehen?"

languages.original_text: {n}Slowly, very slowly, the otherworldly chill begins to retreat from the air around you. A flicker of life appears in Heinrix's face — his eyelids blink in exhaustion, he pulls a ragged breath in past his blue lips, and violent tremors wrack his body.{/n} "? What... happened?"
